name: Fezandipiti ex
author: 5ban Graphics

abilities.name: Flip the Script
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent’s last turn, you may draw 3 cards. You can’t use more than 1 Flip the Script Ability each turn.

attacks.name: Cruel Arrow
attacks.effect: This attack does 100 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
